title: Female Friends Are Unexpectedly Willing To Let You Do Them If You Just Ask - Novel Updates

description:
Minato, a high school student, is an introverted indoor person.

His classmate, Hazuki, is an extroverted normie.

Despite being complete opposites, they became best friends as they hang out daily.

One day, Minato got down on his knees and begged, “Let me do you once!”

When he did, he was easily accepted by the naive Hazuki.
